languages.text: "Забавно вырядился, Энрих! И компания у тебя забавная. Зачем пожаловал — продавать или покупать? И прежде чем ответить, освежи в памяти святое правило — каждое слово имеет цену".

traits.locale_text: "Забавно вырядился, Энрих! И компания у тебя сегодня забавная. Зачем пожаловал — продавать или покупать? И прежде чем ответить, освежи в памяти святое правило этих мест — каждое слово имеет цену".

languages.text: "That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"
languages.original_text: "Забавно вырядился, Энрих! И компания у тебя забавная. Зачем пожаловал — продавать или покупать? И прежде чем ответить, освежи в памяти святое правило — каждое слово имеет цену".

traits.locale_text: "You look funny, Einrich! And you have a funny company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the golden rule! Every word has a price."
"You look funny, Einrich! And you have a funny company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the golden rule! Every word has a price."
"You look funny, Einrich! And you have a funny company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the golden rule! Every word has a price."
"You look funny, Einrich! And you have a funny company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the golden rule! Every word has a price."
"That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"
"That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"

languages.text: "Ihr seht ja komisch aus, Einrich! Und Eure Begleitung auch. Wollt Ihr was verkaufen oder kaufen? Und bevor Ihr antwortet, denkt an die erste Regel: Jedes Wort hat einen Preis!"
languages.original_text: "That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seht ja komisch aus, Einrich! Und Eure Begleitung auch. Wollt Ihr was verkaufen oder kaufen? Und bevor Ihr antwortet, denkt an die erste Regel: Jedes Wort hat einen Preis!"

languages.text: «¡Vaya cara, Einrich! Y menudas compañías traes. ¿Vienes a comprar o a vender? Antes de contestar, recuerda: ¡Cada palabra tiene su precio!».
languages.original_text: "That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Vaya cara, Einrich! Y menudas compañías traes. ¿Vienes a comprar o a vender? Antes de contestar, recuerda: ¡Cada palabra tiene su precio!».

languages.text: 「変な顔してるな、アインリッヒ！それに、変な格好の仲間だな。ここには売りに来たのか？それとも買いに？ああ、答える前に、最初のルールを思い出してくれ。どんな言葉にも値段はある！」
languages.original_text: "That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"

traits.locale_text: 「変な顔してるな、アインリッヒ！それに、変な格好の仲間だな。ここには売りに来たのか？それとも買いに？ああ、答える前に、最初のルールを思い出してくれ。どんな言葉にも値段はある！」

languages.text: “你这个样子可真滑稽，艾因里奇！你的同伴看起来也很有意思。你是来买东西的，还是卖东西的？回答之前，别忘了第一条规矩——每个字都是要钱的！”
languages.original_text: "That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"

traits.locale_text: “你这个样子可真滑稽，艾因里奇！你的同伴看起来也很有意思。你是来买东西的，还是卖东西的？回答之前，别忘了第一条规矩——每个字都是要钱的！”

languages.text: « Drôle de tenue, Einrich ! Et vous êtes accompagné par de drôles d'énergumènes. Vous êtes là pour vendre, ou pour acheter ? Avant de répondre, n'oubliez pas que chaque mot a un prix ! »
languages.original_text: "That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"

traits.locale_text: « Drôle de tenue, Einrich ! Et vous êtes accompagné par de drôles d'énergumènes. Vous êtes là pour vendre, ou pour acheter ? Avant de répondre, n'oubliez pas que chaque mot a un prix ! »

languages.text: "Çok komik görünüyorsun Einrich! Yanındakinin de senden kalır yanı yok. Buraya satmaya mı geldin yoksa almaya mı? Cevap vermeden önce ilk kuralımızı hatırlatayım: Her kelimenin bir ücreti var!"
languages.original_text: "That's a funny look, Einrich! And you have a funny-looking company. Are you here to sell or to buy? And before you answer, remember the first rule: every word has a price!"
